Mishwar to Manchester

"Mishwar" is an Arabic word that literally translates to "trip" or "journey". It has other uses, and is used to translate to "there is no molecule in me that has the energy to go through the hassle of [doing something]" (e.g. Coursework? Mishwar). In this case, it has its literal...
